item.title: Working ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @mod_kay mod kay
item.description:
@mod_kay wrote:

You need to add this in your Client.Java

[quote author=Vengeance link=topic=258581.msg2146079#msg2146079 date=1206862516]
Not sure if the }s at the bottom are correct, but here is one non the less.

[quote author=Vengeance link=topic=258581.msg2146079#msg2146079 date=1206862516]
Not sure if the }s at the bottom are correct, but here is one non the less.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jack”)) {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = otherPName;
sendMessage(p.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/bannedips.txt”, true));
bw.write(p.connectedFrom);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error banning ip.”);
}
}
}
}

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Working ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @mod_kay mod kay
item.description:
@mod_kay wrote:

Ummm, if you have somthing like this

if (command.startsWith(“home”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
sendMessage(“Home Sweet Home”);
teleportToX = 3087;
teleportToY = 3491;
}

Add this on top of that command

[quote author=Vengeance link=topic=258581.msg2146079#msg2146079 date=1206862516]
Not sure if the }s at the bottom are correct, but here is one non the less.

[quote author=Vengeance link=topic=258581.msg2146079#msg2146079 date=1206862516]
Not sure if the }s at the bottom are correct, but here is one non the less.

       if(command.startsWith("ipban") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jack")) {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = otherPName;
sendMessage(p.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
bw.write(p.connectedFrom);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage("Error banning ip.");
}
}
}
}

item.title: Working ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @Vengeance Vengeance
item.description:
@Vengeance wrote:

Not sure if the }s at the bottom are correct, but here is one non the less.

[code]
}

    if (command.startsWith("ipban")
            && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNER NAME HERE"))) {
        String victim = command.substring(6);
        int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
        client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]
